data.lyric:
[ti:Heartache Medication]
[ar:Jon Pardi]
[al:Heartache Medication]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heartache Medication - Jon Pardi
[00:03.93]Lyrics by：Jon Pardi/Barry Dean/Natalie Hemby
[00:07.86]Composed by：Jon Pardi/Barry Dean/Natalie Hemby
[00:11.79]Same old dive same old end of the work week drink
[00:20.29]Bartender knows my name but I don't mind
[00:25.71]She kicks 'em up strong serves me up right
[00:30.83]And here I go again
[00:33.02]I'm drinkin' one I'm drinkin' two
[00:35.55]I got my heartache medication a strong dedication
[00:40.87]To gettin' over you turnin' me loose
[00:45.94]On that hardwood jukebox lost in neon time
[00:51.09]My heartache medication well it suits me fine
[00:56.12]And I'm drinkin' enough to take you off my mind
[01:02.46]I got my heartache medication
[01:10.04]Another girl another dance to a country song
[01:16.86]Turnin' me on here's to a good time
[01:21.66]And halfway to feelin' all right
[01:23.88]And here I go again
[01:26.05]I'm drinkin' one I'm drinkin' two
[01:28.60]I got my heartache medication a strong dedication
[01:33.77]To gettin' over you turnin' me loose
[01:39.04]On that hardwood jukebox lost in neon time
[01:44.43]My heartache medication well it suits me fine
[01:49.20]And I'm drinkin' enough to take you off my mind
[01:55.29]I got my heartache medication
[02:07.38]Single drinkin' doubles
[02:09.35]Teardrops turnin' into bubbles
[02:11.90]Yeah a little later on
[02:14.03]I'll probably find me some trouble
[02:19.57]And here I go again
[02:21.60]I'm drinkin' one I'm drinkin' two
[02:24.23]I got my heartache medication a strong dedication
[02:29.38]To gettin' over you turnin' me loose
[02:34.60]On that hardwood jukebox lost in neon time
[02:39.95]My heartache medication well it suits me fine
[02:44.62]And I'm drinkin' enough to take you off my mind
[02:50.85]I got my heartache medication
[02:56.62]Heartache medication
[03:01.64]Takin' me away
[03:06.80]Oh whoa
data.trans:
[ti:Heartache Medication]
[ar:Jon Pardi]
[al:Heartache Medication]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.93]//
[00:07.86]//
[00:11.79]同一个老酒馆 同是工作结束后的小酌
[00:20.29]酒保记住了我的名字 我毫不介意
[00:25.71]女调酒师调制了浓烈的酒为我奉上
[00:30.83]再次像往常一样
[00:33.02]我喝了一杯 两杯
[00:35.55]举杯消愁 忘掉一切
[00:40.87]为了忘掉你 我尽情放纵 毫无节制
[00:45.94]彻底迷失在霓虹灯光和点唱机的音乐中
[00:51.09]用酒治愈心伤  这种方式最适合我了
[00:56.12]喝得烂醉如泥 终于把你忘记
[01:02.46]用酒治愈心伤
[01:10.04]换了个女孩 伴随一首乡村歌曲起舞
[01:16.86]我兴致高昂 敬这美好的时光
[01:21.66]喝到一半 我便恢复如常
[01:23.88]像往常一样
[01:26.05]我喝了一杯 两杯
[01:28.60]举杯消愁 忘掉一切
[01:33.77]为了忘掉你 我尽情放纵 毫无节制
[01:39.04]彻底迷失在霓虹灯光和点唱机的音乐中
[01:44.43]用酒治愈心伤  这种方式最适合我了
[01:49.20]喝得烂醉如泥 终于把你忘记
[01:55.29]用酒治愈心伤
[02:07.38]一个人喝着两人份
[02:09.35]泪流不止
[02:11.90]再喝一点
[02:14.03]我也许就会惹祸上身
[02:19.57]像往常一样
[02:21.60]我喝了一杯又一杯
[02:24.23]举杯消愁 忘掉一切
[02:29.38]为了忘掉你 我尽情放纵 毫无节制
[02:34.60]彻底迷失在霓虹灯光和点唱机的音乐中
[02:39.95]用酒治愈心伤  这种方式最适合我了
[02:44.62]喝得烂醉如泥 终于把你忘记
[02:50.85]用酒治愈心伤
[02:56.62]用酒治愈心伤
[03:01.64]让我忘掉一切
[03:06.80]//
